fact: Taylor Twellman won the MLS Golden Boot in 2005.
Jeff Cunningham secured the MLS Golden Boot in both 2006 and 2009.
Luciano Emilio was the MLS Golden Boot winner in 2007.
Landon Donovan claimed the MLS Golden Boot in 2008.
Chris Wondolowski won the MLS Golden Boot in 2010 and again in 2012.
Dwayne De Rosario was the MLS Golden Boot recipient in 2011.
Camilo Sanvezzo earned the MLS Golden Boot in 2013.
Bradley Wright-Phillips won the MLS Golden Boot in both 2014 and 2016.
Nemanja Nikolić was the MLS Golden Boot winner in 2017.
Josef Martínez secured the MLS Golden Boot in 2018.
Carlos Vela was the MLS Golden Boot winner in 2019.
Diego Rossi claimed the MLS Golden Boot in 2020.
Taty Castellanos won the MLS Golden Boot in 2021.
Hany Mukhtar was the MLS Golden Boot winner in 2022.
Denis Bouanga earned the MLS Golden Boot in 2023.
Christian Benteke secured the MLS Golden Boot in 2024.
